title: Hunter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During the day, pick a player to trap in the void.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be able to talk with your prisoner anonymously; you will appear to be a Jailor, or if he is dead, a Wisteria. If both are dead, you will appear to be the Hunter.
- You have last priority over a target; if you attempt to jail a Jailor or Wisteria’s target, your ability will fail. If you and the Jailor or Wisteria jail each other, your ability will fail.
- You may execute your prisoner; the kill will be attributed to a Hunter rather than a Jailor or Wisteria. You have one execution, and it will cancel the factional Stalker kill if you use it.
You cannot perform the factional Stalker kill if you have trapped someone in the void.
- While in the void, you will roleblock your target. However, they will have Basic defense and can be visited normally–transporting abilities will not stop your execution.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the presence of the Stalkers.

desc:
Post 511
*All you've ever seen is darkness. How about a fate shared?*
Detection Immunity
Control Immunity
